title: Brooklyn Brewery presents an Above Average Comedy Showcase
desc: On Monday, November 23 at 8 PM, join?hosts? ?and? ( ), (Late Night with Seth Meyers),? ?(UCB),? (WFMU),? ?(Saturday Night Live)?and more as they pack into our Tasting Room for a night of beer, comedy, and surprises. We've come together with?The Internet's Last Hope For Comedy,? , to bring you?a new live comedy showcase featuring up-and-coming comedians, comedy legends, and possibly a?secret drop-in guest?(or two)?to keep you guessing. Last time,? ?and? ?turned up to close the night in raucous style.?Trust us, you really don't want to miss out on this one. Doors open at 7:30 for the evening, so get there on time and grab a good seat.
